channel.title: Artificial Intelligence on Rick Wysocki
channel.description: Recent content in Artificial Intelligence on Rick Wysocki

item.title: Link Roundup: August 5, 2024
item.description: This week’s articles emphasize the importance of archival work and offer an interesting writing-process heuristic.

item.title: Link Roundup: July 29, 2024
item.description: This week’s articles touch on how complexity emerges from simple systems.

item.title: Link Roundup: July 15, 2024
item.description: A link roundup including an article on ways that organizations can set up technical writers to be successful and another offering a waterfall of advice for reflective self-management over a career.

item.title: Link Roundup: July 7, 2024
item.description: This week I’ve included articles on mindfulness in technical writing, friction in software development, and the concerning environmental implications of Hurricane Beryl.

item.title: Article Review: Trust in Artificial Intelligence
item.description: This post discusses a meta-analysis of studies related to trust in AI systems. I consider its implications for how AI might continue to be taken up in work contexts.

item.title: Link Roundup: June 24, 2024
item.description: Some links and thoughts on the relationship between AI and environmental concerns and on action titles as a tool for slide design.

item.title: Link Roundup: June 17, 2024
item.description: Some interesting content I read this week.

item.title: Link Roundup: June 10, 2024
item.description: A link roundup on AI development.
